articles.author: HT News Desk
articles.title: ‘Grateful to POTUS & American people’: Zelensky on fresh US package for Ukraine - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Russia-Ukraine war: The package is in the form of military aid and worth USD 800 million. Last week too, Biden announced a military package, also worth USD 800 million, for the war-ravaged nation. | World News
articles.content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky on Thursday thanked his United States counterpart, Joe Biden, for announcing a fresh package, in the form of military aid and worth USD 800 million, to help the… [+2287 chars]
